text: Valdez TV is a Venezuelan community television channel. It was created in April 2005 and can be seen in the community of Güiria in the Valdez Municipality of the Sucre State of Venezuela on UHF channel 23. Marcos Vargas is the legal representative of the foundation that owns this channel. Valdez TV does not have a website. ==See also== *List of Venezuelan television channels Category:Television networks in Venezuela Category:Television stations in Venezuela Category:Mass media in Venezuela
title: Valdez TV
